intro: Cestichis elegans, commonly known as the elegant cestichis, is a member of the Acanthaceae family. It is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly South Africa. The plant is characterized by its attractive, tubular flowers that come in shades of red, pink, and white. It typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. The leaves are opposite, simple, and often have a velvety texture, adding to its ornamental appeal.
